sentences.sContent: The measurements and morphological description of two population of this nematode were given.
sentences.sContent_eng: The measurements and morphological description of two population of this nematode were given.
sentences.sCn: 对此线虫两个群体进行了形态学测量和描述。

sentences.sContent: Elephantiasis, or lymphatic filariasis, is a mosquito-borne disease caused by several types of nematode worm, including B. malayi.
sentences.sContent_eng: Elephantiasis, or lymphatic filariasis, is a mosquito-borne disease caused by several types of nematode worm, including B. malayi.
sentences.sCn: 象皮病（淋巴丝虫病）是一种蚊媒疾病，它是由包括马来丝虫在内的几种线虫导致的。

trans.tranOther: any unsegmented worm of the phylum (or class) Nematoda, having a tough outer cuticle
